text.headline: Business Management at National University of Colombia
Participation in millionaire bag competition on trii
text.text: This was the first time that I was able to put into practice what I had learned so far about the financial markets. I learned many things about the stock market in Colombia and was able to get position 199 out of 2634 participants, obtaining a profit of 6.5% in one month.

text.headline: Junior fixed income researcher
text.text: I joined the university's economics analysis unit as a fixed income researcher. Here I learned many things about fixed income and together with my team we developed a research project on the viability of investing in Colombian sovereign bonds in 2023 through a macroeconomic analysis.

text.headline: Estimating food demand at the National University of Colombia
text.text: This was my first data science project where I discovered my passion for data science. Performing an adequate analysis of data from past semesters and using a machine learning model, this project estimated the food demand for the second semester of 2023 in each of the university's restaurants.

text.headline: Technical analysis course with strategic focus
text.text: After months of development, I managed to teach my first course on the use of technical analysis in financial markets at university. It was a totally satisfactory experience being able to share my knowledge. In this course I taught topics critically and based on statistics, allowing students to develop a better understanding of the topic.

text.headline: Research Leader in Capital markets
text.text: After learning many more things about data science and financial markets, I managed to reach a research leader position. At this moment my team and I are developing a research project related to the use of natural language processing techniques, sentiment analysis and machine learning for making investment decisions in the capital markets
